name: Summer Blast Memory Game
description:
Flip each panel and match 2 images.  How fast can you clear them all?  

In addition to being so much fun to play, memory games have added benefits for your brain!  Playing memory games not only enhances your memory, but improves your focus, your attention span, and your reasoning skills.  These types of games have benefits for every age group, from children to the elderly.  Start playing today and keep challenging your brain!
